title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. D - Motor Carriers Of Passengers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. D - Motor Carriers Of Passengers

State Regulations

Article 1 - Certificates of Public Convenience and Necessity and Permits (Part 700 to 701)

Article 2 - Repealed (Part 710)

Article 3 - Safety (Part 720 to 724)

Article 4 - Rates and Charges (Part 730 to 732)

Article 5 - Records; Reports (Part 740 to 744)

Article 6 - Insurance (Part 750)

Article 7 - Uniform Systems of Accounts for Bus Corporations (Subarticle A)

Article 8 - Miscellaneous (Part 780 to 781)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. D
This chapter pertains to bus corporations (including street
railroad corporations operating bus lines), contract carriers of passengers and
the safety of operation of motor vehicles encompassed within articles 6 and 9
of the Transportation Law. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
